name: Dagon
description: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

abilities.name: Energy Burst
abilities.description: Emits a powerful burst of magical damage upon a targeted enemy unit, dealing great damage.
notes: Casting on a unit that is not a hero, ancient creep, or creep-hero, instantly kills it
Instantly kills regular illusions regardless of any status effects, except when affected by Shallow Grave
Does not heal when instant killing illusions
The healing value is based on the damage dealt, amplifying or reducing the damage affects the healing value
Places a debuff on the target, which applies the damage upon expiring
Due to server tick rates, the debuff effectively lasts 0.033 seconds
Multiple casts during the same server tick do not stack and only refresh the debuff
Energy Burst first applies the damage, the damage as heal, then the spell lifesteal

additionalInfo: Dagon can be upgraded by purchasing the recipe again, up to 4 times
Upgrading the item improves its stats and also Energy Burst
The total gold cost for each level is 2850/4000/5150/6300/7450
